DashboardUsageStatistics.description:
Experimental (Subject to breaking change) -- Stats corresponding to dashboard's usage.

If this aspect represents the latest snapshot of the statistics about a Dashboard, the eventGranularity field should be null. 
If this aspect represents a bucketed window of usage statistics (e.g. over a day), then the eventGranularity field should be set accordingly.

timestampMillis.description: The event timestamp field as epoch at UTC in milli seconds.

eventGranularity.description: Granularity of the event if applicable

messageId.description: The optional messageId, if provided serves as a custom user-defined unique identifier for an aspect value.

viewsCount.description: The total number of times dashboard has been viewed

executionsCount.description: The total number of dashboard executions (refreshes / syncs)

userCounts.description: Users within this bucket, with frequency counts

favoritesCount.description: The total number of times that the dashboard has been favorited

lastViewedAt.description:
Last viewed at

This should not be set in cases where statistics are windowed.

TimeWindowSize.description: Defines the size of a time window.

unit.description: Interval unit such as minute/hour/day etc.

PartitionSpec.description: A reference to a specific partition in a dataset.

partition.description:
A unique id / value for the partition for which statistics were collected,
generated by applying the key definition to a given row.

timePartition.description: Time window of the partition, if we are able to extract it from the partition key.

startTimeMillis.description: Start time as epoch at UTC.

DashboardUserUsageCounts.description: Records a single user's usage counts for a given resource

user.description: The unique id of the user.

viewsCount.description: The number of times the user has viewed the dashboard

executionsCount.description: The number of times the user has executed (refreshed) the dashboard

usageCount.description: Normalized numeric metric representing user's dashboard usage -- the number of times the user executed or viewed the dashboard.

userEmail.description: If user_email is set, we attempt to resolve the user's urn upon ingest
